name: Iberostar Grand Salome
description: The iberostar grand salome has an exceptional location in the South of Tenerife, overlooking the Atlantic Ocean. It is situated between the the Golf del Sur and the amarillo golf courses and is an ideal hotel for families, couples and groups who are looking for a holiday full of sun, sport and sea.
